We Want To Live By Aajonus Vonderplanitz ğŸ“š  The myth that raw food cause bacterial disease was ingrained into society when two giant food manufactures paid fortunes in research from 1928-1938 to prove that bacteria in food causes disease. They wanted to prove that their cooked and processed foods were cleaner, healthier and safer than raw foods. Animals were separated into two groups. Several groups were fed raw food and others were fed cooked, processed food. The companies' officers released to the press, the conclusion based on mere speculation and belief that the theory that bacteria in raw food caused disease. When the long-term results of that research proved that the raw-food-fed groups did not develop any disease, and that the cooked/processed-fed groups developed most of the diseases that humans suffer, the two companies burned all of the research and hid the results from the public in 1940.  Only bacteria feeding on cooked, non-organic foods are likely to turn pathogenic. E. coli feeds rapidly on frozen meat but is not dangerous if eaten raw. The worst that could happen from eating raw meat with a high bacteria count is vomit or diarrhea, yet that response is very rare, and not from poisoning. Instead, it is a radical detoxification of the liver, pancreas or intestines. The toxins are potentially damaging and so the body must flush them quickly. Tom McDonald is a living contradiction. He's a walking meme. He's a satire of himself.   He's a Canadian posing as an American nationalist.   He regularly criticises modern rap while being the embodiment of commodified and generic modern rap.   He talks about being censored and cancel culture as his videos and songs rack up tens of millions of views and plays on mainstream platforms like YouTube and Spotify.   He regularly targets millennials with criticism in his rap but he's very literally just a millennial who "raps" right-wing talking points, straight from the Fox News echo chambers to a demographic of fans largely made up of boomers and late teen to adolescent young white men with conservative values and cult-like obsession with identity politics and conspiracy theories.   His music career is either a very clever grift cashing in on the toxic politics and fringe radicalisation of kids in the conservative south or he's actually a living contradiction.

Romans 3:23 states: "For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;". We are all sinners, that have committed at least one sin in our lives, which earns us an eternal punishment in Hell. Revelation states 21:8 "But the fearful, and unbelieving, and the abominable, and murderers, and whoremongers, and sorcerers, and idolaters, and all liars, shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone: which is the second death.". God sent his Son, Jesus, to Earth as a perfect sinless sacrifice. To take on all the sins of the world; both past, present, and future sins. Shedding his blood on the cross as a blood atonement for all sins. After dying on the cross, he rose from the dead on the 3rd day and rose to Heaven. To show life after death. To show everlasting life through Jesus's sacrifice. John 14:6 states: "Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.". Romans 10:13 states "For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.".      Eternal life in heaven is just one prayer away. All you have to do is believe that Jesus Christ, the Son of God, died on the cross for your sins. As an atonement for your sins. And rose from the grave on the 3rd day. Ask Jesus to save you of your sins and give you eternal life in Heaven. Salvation is a free and everlasting gift from God. Please don't let pride drag you into eternal punishment in Hell, but ask Jesus to give you eternal life in Heaven. If you're getting a strong feeling of resistance while reading this, it's because Satan doesn't want you to get saved. He wants you to resist, and think it's not real. He wants you in Hell for all eternity with him. Hell is not a fun place, like worldly people like to imagine. It's everlasting torture with no relief. I'm only taking the time to text this, because I want to get the message out. There are so many distractions in life keeping people from witnessing to other people. Keeping people from thinking about salvation. Keeping you from thinking about life after death. Please, ask Jesus into your hearts to save you of your sins and cleanse you from all unrighteousness. Ask him for a place in Heaven, and he will save you from eternal damnation in Hell.

One other thing Tom, experiment with different structures. A lot of your songs are: Verse 1 Verse 2 Chorus Verse 3 (Verse 4) Chorus (Verse 5) (Verse 6) (Chorus) Bridge Chorus  I love rock n roll, because they're very versatile when it comes to music and songs. Many times rock doesn't follow this structure.  Just a suggestion from a friend- experiment more.  Cheers.

I'm sorry but I'm disappointed again, Tom. Your demeaning yourself and your legacy everytime you lower yourself to produce a song of this nature. Why do you care what anyone who doesn't care about you says? You say you don't care but the fact you keep making songs with this feel and message says otherwise. Actually its not necessarily the message so much as the way its delivered which just comes off as the distasteful unnecessary and in truth self diminishishing taunting of  an petulant petty adolescent poser with the emotional maturity of a 2 year old. It devalues you and the rest of your works. You are better than this Tom and you don't have to point it out. It is self evident enough for those with the eyes, ears, and mind to perceive it. Those who can't won't be changed nor even affected by your barbed words. They are mostly too dumb or blind to be. I hope that is out of your system sooner than later for yours and the sake of those around you for you whom are already enjoying the benefits of your success will find greater benefits when it's for something more meaningful you do the work for. Much love and respect. Please don't let your initial emotional response keep you from really considering these things I've cared enough about who you are as a person and your emotional well being though we've never met to mention now a couple of times. You may be a rebellious,  confrontational, never hold back kind of @$$#0\_â‚¬ but those are some of the traits of most archetypal heroes also. One very common one I didn't mention is a humble self image. Confidence is useful and productive always. Cocky can be useful and productive but it can also be the root of your own self destruction. It can be overcompensation for your self doubt or it can be that your too dumb to know better but anyone who knows your feet don't fit in clown shoes even when your clowning knows it's not that second possibility. Idk, like I said we have never met so I can't make a knowledgeable assessment. It's just the perspective of an outsider sharing the bad taste this left in my mouth. I wish the best for you and yours. I know you will find your way without help from the likes of me. We are born into this world knowing how to love unconditionally. Kids don't need to learn to be more grown up. Grown ups need to remember how to be a kid when it comes to certain things. Peace

Fun fact: that mound of bones is made up of a wooden box that Tom built that is surrounded with cinder blocks and those cinderblocks are filled with waterproof paper and covered with canned spray insulation foam. Then Tom spray painted that mound of foam over the cinderblocks with black spray paint and that was covered with topsoil which surprisingly was mostly manure lol ğŸ˜‚. THE GOSPEL OF SALVATION âœï¸  Jesus Christ died on the Cross for your sins he shedded his blood for you. But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and by his stripes we are healed. Christ Jesus took the punishment we 100% deserved He died on the cross shedding his blood for you and he (Christ Jesus) was buried and here is the best part he(Christ Jesus)rose from the grave 3 days later defeating death and proved that everything that he(Christ Jesus) said is true and Christ Jesus ascended up to Heaven and is now at the right hand of the father.  The Gospel for the New Testament Church is 1 Cor. 15: 1-4 KJV and Romans 3: 25 KJV explains it even further. It's what Christ Jesus did for us that we're saved and it's by faith alone, not works. We're forgiven for all sins by Christ's shed blood. According to the Bible unlike what other Christians be teaching salvation is by receiving (BY FAITH!!) what Christ Jesus DID on the cross at Calvary, when  HE(Christ Jesus) shed his BLOOD to pay for the sins of man. HIS FINISHED WORK, done ONCE AND FOR ALL, is the ONLY THING that can save a Sinner and give him forgiveness of sins and eternal life.  NOTE: "according to the scriptures" (1 Cor 15:3) means it was preached before hand in the word of God. Other versus reinforcing your Salvation by the Gospel. Rom 1:16 (Salvation?!?! who wrote Romans??? Rom 2:16 (God will judge by who's Gospel??) 1 Cor 1:17; (No baptism, just faith in the Gospel!) 2 Cor 4:3-4 (Those who don't understand are??) Gal 1: 6-9; (Preach no other Gospel please!!) Eph 1:13; (Sealed with the Holy Spirit when???) Eph 3:1-7 (How are the Gentiles Heirs??) 1 Thess 4:14 (There goes that Gospel again!) 2 Thess 1:6-8 (Scary if you don't believe!!!) EVERY WRITER of these books are Paul aka Saul (Acts 13:9). He's going through each city, as the Holy Spirit leads him (Acts 13:2), to preach the message or the Gospel because God commissioned Paul in Acts that he would bear Jesus name to the Gentiles (Acts 9:15; 26:14-18). The Gospel or the Good News is that Christ is not dead as everyone thought, but His death was accomplished to actually save us from our sins and by Him being raised from the dead, He now lives and we can be confident we will live too because we're sealed with the Holy Spirit (Rom 8:11; Eph 1:13 ). isn't that GOOD NEWS???  The difference in Paul's gospel from Jesus's gospel was that Jesus's gospel preached: believe that I am the Son of God (Matt 16:16-17;John 3:16; 6:69;11:27) repent and prepare for the kingdom of God. Jesus has not died yet, so they couldn't believe in His death, burial, and resurrection-nor did any of his disciples understand when He told them (Luke 18:31-33). Any follower or disciple of Jesus simply had to only believe who Jesus, repent or turn away from their sins and prepare themselves because the kingdom of God was at hand (Mark 1:14-15). Don't believe the words I tell you, but read and believe Christ as my personal Lord and Savior is neglecting that Christ died on the cross for you. By believing in the gospel, your now placed in the body of Christ, which Christ is the head and "Lord" over (Romans 14:9). In addition, because of Christ's Death, burial, and resurrection--God the Father gave Christ all authority (or LORD) over all things (Matt28:18; Phil 2:8-11). He is NOW your "SAVIOR" because He died for your sins and saved you from external punishment and death.  Notice that the Gospel is what JESUS DID FOR MAN, and not what MAN CAN DO FOR GOD! A person is only saved by BELIEVING in the finished work of Jesus Christ, when he shed his Precious Blood for our sins. This blood atonement was necessary, for without shedding of blood, there is no remission (Heb. 9:22). God has always demanded blood for sin. WITHOUT SHEDDING OF BLOOD THERE IS NO REMISSION OF SINS!! In the Old Testament, God accepted the blood of a lamb. In the New Testament, God accepts the shed blood of Jesus Christ, the LAMB OF GOD, slain for your sins.  Now, to be saved, the Bible clearly teaches us that salvation is by FAITH, without WORKS (Eph. 2:8-9). Faith in what you may ask? FAITH IN THAT SHED BLOOD OF CHRIST JESUS! Romans 3:25-28 makes this very clear:  Romans 3:25-28 King James Version 25 Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God: 26 To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus. 27 Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith. 28 Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law.  BE CAREFUL OF PEOPLE TRYING TO TELL YOU that it's what you do or that you gotta work for your salvation IGNORE AND WALK AWAY BECAUSE THEY DO NOT KNOW THE TRUTH READ ROMANS CHAPTERS 3-6. We are not saved by repenting (turning from sin), being baptized in water, walking an aisle, saying a prayer, confessing with your mouth, being "born again" or following Jesus' earthly ministry. Those are all "works" salvation.  We are saved by grace not works (Rom 11:6), through faith alone, in Christ work on the cross. It is a gift 100%. Eph 2:8-9; Titus 3:5-6, I Cor 15:1-4 Romans 5:8 He(Christ Jesus) came to save sinners, not people trying to make themselves righteous by doing some kind of good work or turning from their sins, they can't that do anyway.  Simply believe and put your trust in the gospel Paul gave us from Jesus. Then start reading Romans- Philemon to understand what was written to us the body of Christ, so we could know what God wants from us and who we are in Christ, once we are saved. The books Paul wrote are the onlv place we find the gospel that saves us today. Then read the rest of your bible that is for us but not to and about us. 94% of the bible is to and about Israel. Don't steal their mail and try to make it yours. And DO NOT BE FOOLED BY PEOPLE WHO TELL YOU, YOU NEED TO DO SOME WORK TO BE SAVED OR TO STAY SAVED!!! That is not the gospel for us today which is a free gift of GRACE when we believe. Eph 2:8-9  Follow and read the versus's and let God guide you to victory. Remember to TEST ALL THINGS (INCLUDING MYSELF) and hold on to that which is true (1 John 4:1; 1 Thess 5:21 ). If these scriptures about salvation are contradicting what you heard before in your church, from your pastor, teacher, or from whomever then that's your cue to Research.Research.Researchâ€¦Research by COMPARING SCRIPTURE with SCRIPTURE!!! Let God be true and every man a liar (Rom 3:4). That goes for any person or anyone who teaches you scriptures, hear them with all readiness, but don't set your heart on it until you search and read the scriptures for yourself (Acts 17:11).DON'T PLAY GAMES WHEN IT COME TO ETERNAL LIFE!! Each person is going to be responsible to God in judgment and all excuses will be eliminated including: this person told me this and this person told me that, the preacher told me this and a teacher told me thatâ€¦You are responsible to God to work out your own salvation (Phil 2:12 )!!! We all have the bible to search the scriptures. If you need help, then pray to God for understanding (James 1:5; Proverbs 2:6). It's His book and His words, who other than to pray to for understanding????? Once you get that understanding, then set your heart on that which is true by believing that Christ died for your sins, and He was buried, and rose again the 3rd day (1 Cor 15:1-4). Your salvation will be secure and we will meet in heaven and rejoice together for your faith in the Gospel whomever you are!  So basically what I'm saying is in order to truly be saved, a person's faith must be wholly in the shed blood of Jesus Christ. Not our works BUT IN THE FINISHED WORK OF THE LORD CHRIST JESUS THE SHEDDING OF HIS BLOOD!! This declares God the Just one. When a sinner is saved, he cannot and will not ever boast about himself or his works. He'll only brag upon Jesus Christ who saved him from his sins and especially from hell!!!  1 Corinthians 15:1-4 King James Version 15 Moreover, brethren, I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you, which also ye have received, and wherein ye stand; 2 By which also ye are saved, if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you, unless ye have believed in vain. 3 For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received, how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures; 4 And that he was buried, and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures:  Hebrews 9:22 King James Version 22 And almost all things are by the law purged with blood; and without shedding of blood is no remission.  Ephesians 2:8-9 King James Version 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: 9 Not of works, lest any man should boast.  Romans 5:8 King James Version 8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.  Romans 6:23 King James Version 23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.  Romans 10:9-11 King James Version 9 That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved. 10 For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation. 11 For the scripture saith, Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed,  John 3:16 King James Version 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life  Please take your time to watch this 15 or 1 hour video I'll pray that you will  https://youtu.be/lbb4xwYj19g ( 15 min short video â¤ï¸)  https://youtu.be/qJT7RbMGGJw ( 1 hour videoâ¤ï¸)

Top 10 Of The World's Funniest One Liners!  1. Ninety-nine percent of lawyers give the rest a bad name. 2. Few women admit their age; few men act it. 3. If we arenâ€™t supposed to eat animals, why are they made with meat? 4. Why is "abbreviation" such a long word? 5. Nuke the Whales. 6. You can't have everything; where would you put it? 7. I took an IQ test and the results were negative. 8. Nothing is fool proof to a sufficiently talented fool.  9. On the other hand, you have different fingers. 10. The more people I meet, the more I like my dog.   Editorial: Maybe the world's most thought-provoking one-liner is "Eat right. Stay fit. Die anyway." It's sad but true -- no matter what you do, you will die. This is because you have sinned against God. Let's see if that's true: Have you ever lied (even once)? Ever stolen (anything)? Jesus said, "Whoever looks upon a woman to lust after her, has committed adultery already with her in his heart." Ever looked with lust? If you have said "Yes" to these three questions, by your own admission, you are a lying, thieving, adulterer at heart; and we've only looked at three of the Ten Commandments. How will you do on Judgment Day? Will you be innocent or guilty? You know that you will be guilty, and end up in Hell. That's not God's will. He provided a way for you to be forgiven. He sent His Son to take your punishment: "God commended His love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us." Jesus then rose from the dead and defeated death. God promises everlasting life to all those who confess and forsake their sins, and trust in Jesus Christ. Please do that today . . . you may not have tomorrow. See John 14:21 for a wonderful promise. Then read the Bible daily and obey what you read. God will never let you down.Visit needgod.com

Uhhhhmmmmm......... Not be a dick. But this one kinda let me down. See, I'm used to Tom having hot takes on current events. With a title like riot, i thought for sure he was going to talk about the escalating social unrest and talks about civil war. The visuals are great, the instruments were stellar, but the lyrics were lackluster.      I love Tom's work. I got all his CD's signed. He is on my daily driver list. Biggest reason for that being is because I feel like I'm finally listening to someone be different from the rest. I feel like his music is revolutionary and eye opening. This however, felt like I was listening to another regular rapper. Which Tom definitely isn't. I'm sorry, but I'm not feeling this one...
